title: LeaveBuster
body: I don't understand the leavebuster system ._. I left one game and then league decides to put me into 20 minute lower priority queue.

replies.body: Drop the attitude. Leavebuster is super broke. I just got a 20 minute ban for games i never afked, all were crashes, with attempt to rejoin halted at load screen, and when I'm finally able to load the game is already over. I have played about 100 games and its crashed about 20 times on load. the game has flaws and bugs shouldnt get people banned- end of story.
Leaving one game will get you a warning. Leaving a few more games would get you a lesser low priority queue wait. To get a 20 minute wait, you have to leave or afk quite a few games.
Just to be clear, we only get the warning once right? Say I leave a game several months after the warning, would I get another warning or would it just count towards getting low priority queued?

You will only get one warning, which you must agree to before you can play any more games. This is to make sure players know that leaving a game is not acceptable. Many people are used to playing games where leaving is the norm.
Cool, just wanted to know if it was possible to get more than one warning.

And people make serious efforts to fix these problems; the afks usually occur in small blocks of time.

If Riot looked at the past year of dcs instead of looking at dcs over all time, people who fix the problem would be rewarded.

Ikr,I just played a game and there wasn't any internet so I used my phone for internet. I had to restart and go in and out over and over again until at the end I got in. Sadly,our Kindred had to go so we had to surrender. I was there at the surrender and even though I WAS THERE at the end I still got a 20 minute queue. I mean what's up with that???!!!
